ISSUE.TITLE: Add required packages to setup.py
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: On `invoices-generation-command` branch the requirements in `setup.py` are not in line with those from `requirements.txt`.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Updated package requirements * Added xhtml2pdf and django-xhtml2pdf to setup.py (fixes #113) * Removed boto and django-storages from requirements/common.txt (#114)
